text:
Education: B.Tech from Non-IIT Tier-1
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Fresher
Date of the Offer: May 2021
Company: cure.fit (renamed as cult.fit now)
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer (SDE-1)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: INR 19,50,000
Joining Bonus: INR 1,00,000
ESOPS: INR 7,00,000 (Equally distributed in 4 years)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): INR 20,50,000 (Not including stocks as company is currently privately held)
Other benefits: Standard cure.fit benefits
